00036 #include "Exponent.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 Exponent::constMemberPtr Exponent::get_func_ptr( double exponent )
00043 {
00044   if (exponent == 0.0)
00045     return &Exponent::pow0;
00046   else if (exponent == 1.0)
00047     return &Exponent::pow1;
00048   else if (exponent == 0.5)
00049     return &Exponent::squareRoot;
00050   else if (exponent == 1./3.)
00051     return &Exponent::cubeRoot;
00052   else if (exponent == -1./3.)
00053     return &Exponent::invCubeRoot;
00054   else if (exponent == 2./3.)
00055     return &Exponent::powTwoThirds;
00056   else if (exponent == -2./3.)
00057     return &Exponent::invTwoThirds;
00058   else if (exponent == 2.0)
00059     return &Exponent::pow2;
00060   else if (exponent == -1.0)
00061     return &Exponent::inverse;
00062   else if (exponent == -0.5)
00063     return &Exponent::invSquareRoot;
00064   else if (exponent == 1.5)
00065     return &Exponent::powThreeHalves;
00066   else if (exponent == -2.0)
00067     return &Exponent::invSquare;
00068   else if (std::floor(exponent) == exponent)
00069   {
00070     if (exponent > 0.0)
00071       return &Exponent::powPositiveInt;
00072     else
00073       return &Exponent::powNegativeInt;
00074   }
00075   else 
00076     return &Exponent::std_pow;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void Exponent::set_exponent( double exponent )
00080 {
00081   mExponent = exponent;
00082   funcPointer = get_func_ptr( exponent );
00083 }
00084 
00085 double Exponent::pow0( double   ) const          { return 1.0;   }
00086 double Exponent::pow1( double x ) const          { return x;     }
00087 double Exponent::pow2( double x ) const          { return x * x; }
00088 double Exponent::squareRoot( double x ) const    { return std::sqrt( x ); }
00089 double Exponent::cubeRoot( double x ) const      { return Mesquite::cbrt( x ); }
00090 double Exponent::invCubeRoot( double x ) const   { return 1.0/Mesquite::cbrt( x ); }
00091 double Exponent::powTwoThirds( double x ) const  { return Mesquite::cbrt_sqr(x); }
00092 double Exponent::invTwoThirds( double x ) const  { return 1.0 / Mesquite::cbrt_sqr(x); }
00093 double Exponent::std_pow( double x ) const       { return std::pow( x, mExponent ); }
00094 double Exponent::inverse( double x ) const       { return 1.0 / x; }
00095 double Exponent::invSquareRoot( double x ) const { return 1.0 / std::sqrt(x); }
00096 double Exponent::powThreeHalves( double x ) const{ return x*x*x / std::sqrt(x); }
00097 double Exponent::invSquare( double x ) const     { return 1.0 / (x*x); }
00098 
00099 double Exponent::powPositiveInt( double x ) const
00100 {
00101   double result = x;
00102   for (int i = (int)mExponent - 1; i > 0; --i)
00103     result *= x;
00104   return result;
00105 }
00106 
00107 double Exponent::powNegativeInt( double x ) const
00108 {
00109   double result = x;
00110   for (int i = (-(int)mExponent) - 1; i > 0; --i)
00111     result *= x;
00112   return 1.0/result;
00113 }
